Node.name: Doors
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the vehicle doors

Node.name: <door-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents an instance of the vehicle doors. The name is one of:
Node.Name: Front hood
Front Left Side Door
Front Right Side Door
Rear Left Side Door
Rear Right Side Door
Hatchback or Rear Lifting Door
Left Side Sliding Door
Right Side Sliding Door
Trunk
Rear Swinging Door

Node.name: DoorPosition
Node.Description: Gets and/or sets the position of the door instance in percent

Node.name: LockState
Node.Description: Sets and/or gets state of the door instance lock

Node.name: Windows
Node.Description: Groups all windows

Node.name: <window-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents an instance of the vehicle windows
Node.Name: Front Windscreen
Front Left Side Window
Front Right Side \Window
Left Rear Side Window
Right Rear Side Window
Rear Window/Back Glass
Additional Left Side Window
Additional Right Side Window
Additional Left Rear Side Window
Additional Rght Rear Side Window
Additional or Separate Right Side Back Glass
Additional or Separate Left Side Back Glass
Sunroof/Moonroof
Tilt Roof (different mode for sun roof treated as a sdifferent window)

Node.name: WindowPosition
Node.Description: Gets and/or sets the position of the window instance in percent

Node.name: LockState
Node.Description: Sets and/or gets state of the window lock

Node.name: PinchState
Node.Description: Gets state of the window anti Pinch Subsystem

Node.name: ShadePosition
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets position of shade for Awindow Instance

Node.name: RunningLamps
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the running lamps of the vehicle

Node.name: DrivingLamps
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the Headlamps of the vehicle

Node.name: <headlamp-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific Headlamp of the vehicle.
Node.Name: Left Low Beam Lamp
Left High Beam Lamp
Right Low Beam Lamp
Right High Beam Lamp

Node.name: LampState
Node.Description: Gets and sets the state of the headlamp instance

Node.name: LampPosition
Node.Description: Gets and/or Sets the lateral position of the headamps

Node.name: <drivinglamp-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific Driving Lamp of the vehicle.
Node.Name: Left Front Parking Lamp
Right Front Parking Lamp
Left Front Side Marker Lamp
Right Front Side Marker Lamp
Left Rear Tail Lamp
Right Rear Tail Lamp
Left Rear Side Marker Lamp
Right Rear Side Marker Lamp
Right License Plate Lamp
Left License Plate Lamp
Front Left Supplemental Lamp A
Front Left Supplemental Lamp B
Front Right Supplemental Lamp A
Front Right Supplemental Lamp B
Left Side Supplemental Lamp A
Right Side Supplemental Lamp B
Rear Left Supplemental Lamp A
Rear Left Supplemental Lamp B
Rear Right Supplemental Lamp A
Rear Right Supplemental Lamp B
Front Left Turn Signal
Front Right Turn Signal
Left Side Turn Signal A
Left Side Turn Signal B
Right Side Turn Signal A
Right Side Turn Signal B
Rear Left Turn Signal
Rear Left Turn Signal
Rear Left Brake Lamp
Rear Right Brake Lamp
Center Brake Lamp
Rear Left Backup Lamp
Rear Right Backup Lamp
Front Left Fog Lamp
Front Right Fog Lamp
Rear Left Fog Lamp
Rear Right Fog Lamp

Node.name: LampState
Node.Description: Gets the state of the Driving Lamp

Node.name: Flasher
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the signal flasher system

Node.name: FlasherState
Node.Description: Sets or gets the stste of the flasher system

Node.name: FlasherDuty
Node.Description: Sets or gets the duty cycle of the flasher in percent

Node.name: FlasherPeriod
Node.Description: Sets or gets the period between on cycles of the flasher

Node.name: Mirrors
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the mirrors of the vehicle

Node.name: <mirror-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific mirror of the vehicle.
Node.Name: Inside rearview mirror
Left outside rearview mirror
Right outside rearview mirror
Rear Mirror (to show ground while backing)
Forward Mirror (to see the ground in front of the vehicle)

Node.name: Tilt
Node.Description: Sets or gets the vertical tilt position of the mirror in percent
Node.Value: Range full down to full up

Node.name: Pan
Node.Description: Sets or gets the horizontal pan position of the mirror
Node.Value: Range full left to full right

Node.name: HeatState
Node.Description: Sets or gets the state of the mirror heater
Node.comment: Don?t we have to handle error cases here? No

Node.name: MirrorReflect
Node.Description: Sets or gets the state of the mirror reflective level in percent of the maximum reflectivity

Node.name: Airbag
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the supplemental airbag restraints for the vehicle

Node.name: <airbag-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the airbag instances for the vehicle
Node.Name: Front Left Airbag
Front Right Airbag
Front Left Side Lower Airbag
Front Right Side Lower Airbag
Front Left Side Upper Airbag
Front Right Side Upper Airbag
Rear Left Side Lower Airbag
Rear Right Side Lower Airbag
Rear Left Side Upper Airbag
Rear Right Side Upper Airbag

Node.name: State
Node.Description: Gets the airbag state for the airbag instance

Node.name: DeploymentTime
Node.Description: Gets Time at deployment

Node.name: Rollbar
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the supplemental deployable rollbars for the vehicle

Node.name: <rollbar-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the rollbar instances for the vehicle
Node.Name: Front Left Rollbar
Front Right Rollbar
Rear Left Rollbar
Rear Right Rollbar
Front Rollbar
Rear Rollbar

Node.name: State
Node.Description: Gets the rollbar state for the airbag rollbar

Node.name: DeploymentTime
Node.Description: Gets Time at deployment

Node.name: ConvertibleTop
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the convertible top

Node.name: TopState
Node.Description: Gets and sets the position state for the convertible top

Node.name: ExtTemp
Node.Description: Measured temp for the HVAC Zone Instance in Deg C

Node.name: Sun
Node.Description: Gets the measurement of sunlight intensity

Node.name: Rain
Node.Description: Gets the state of the rain sensor
Node.comment: The rain sensor is usually a self contained binary elemenmt

Node.name: RainSens
Node.Description: Gets and Sets the rain sensitivity level

Node.name: Noise
Node.Description: Gets the interior noise level in dBa

Node.name: Wipers
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the wipers

Node.name: <wiper-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific wiper instance. Name must be one of:
Node.Name: Front
Rear
Headlamps

Node.name: WiperState
Node.Description: Gets and sets the state of the wiper Instance

Node.name: WipeInterval
Node.Description: Gets and sets the intermittent wipe interval

Node.name: Washers
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the washer fluid tanks

Node.name: <washer-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific washer fluid tank instance.
Node.Name: Primary (windshield) washing fluid tank
Rear window washing fluid tank
Head light washing fluid tank
Supplemental washing fluid tank

Node.name: WasherFluidType
Node.Description: Gets the manufacturer?s recommended washer fluid type

Node.name: WasherTankCapacity
Node.Description: Gets the capacity of the tank instance in liters
Node.comment: Would this just be the max value of TankLevel?

Node.name: WasherTankLevel
Node.Description: Gets the measurement of the tank instance level in percent of total capacity

Node.name: WasherState
Node.Description: Gets and Sets the Washer Pump State

Node.name: WasherHeatState
Node.Description: Gets and Sets the Washer Fluid Heater State

Node.name: <battery-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific battery instance. Name must be one of:
Node.Name: Main operating battery
Secondary operating battery
Additional battery#1
Additional battery#2

Node.name: BattCapacity
Node.Description: Gets the capacity of the battery instance in Ampere-Hours

Node.name: ChargeLevel
Node.Description: Gets the Charge level of the battery instance in percent of full capacity

Node.name: BatteryState
Node.Description: Gets the battery state

Node.name: Horn
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the vehicle horns and sirens

Node.name: <horn-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific Horn instance. Name must be one of:
Node.Name: Conventional car horn A
Conventional car horn B
low level chime or beeper
Siren

Node.name: HornState
Node.Description: Gets and sets the state of the horn instance

Node.name: HornAudio
Node.Description: Audio value output to the Horn

Node.name: <hornMode-instance>
Node.Description: Optional interior mode comprising pre-defined horn sounds. Works with HornState. Name must be one of:
Node.comment: Unclear how we might know what these sounds would be
Node.Name: Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones

Node.name: Antenna
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the vehicle radio antennas

Node.name: <antenna-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific vehicle radio antenna instance.

Node.name: AntennaState
Node.Description: Sets and Gets the state of the antenna instance

Node.name: Ignition
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the main ignition switch

Node.name: IgnitionState
Node.Description: Sets and gets the state of the main ignition switch

Node.name: Chime
Node.Description: Interior node that represents the vehicle interior chimes

Node.name: <chime-instance>
Node.Description: Interior node that represents a specific chime instance. Name must be one of:

Node.name: ChimeState
Node.Description: Gets and sets the state of the Chime instance

Node.name: ChimeAudio
Node.Description: Gets and/or sets the audio value output to the chime

Node.name: <chimeMode-instance>
Node.Description: Optional interior mode comprising pre-defined chime sounds. Works with ChimeState.
Node.comment: Unclear how we might know what these sounds would be
Node.Name: Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
Manufacturer or aftermarket defined Audio files and/or custom tones
